elements.name: lkigai
elements.description: Discover your purpose in life. Find something that makes you to wake up every day, aligning with your talents, passions, profession, and contribution to this world. Your purpose fuels you.

elements.name: Kaizen
elements.description: Focus on small improvements each day instead of trying to do everything at once. Make progress little by little, sometimes involving others

elements.name: Pomodoro technique
elements.description: Work for 25 minutes without distractions, take a break for 5 minutes, and then repeat. It’s a great way to get more done in less time.

elements.name: Hara Hachi Bu
elements.description: Eat slowly and not to stuff yourself. When you’re 80% full, you’ll feel satisfied. Also increases your energy levels and improves mood.

elements.name: Shoshin
elements.description: Approach every task like a beginner with the same curiosity as if you were doing it for the first time, from work to relationships to personal growth.

elements.name: Wabi-sabi
elements.description: Embrace imperfection. Instead of stressing over every little detail, focus on what’s important and find beauty in simplicity. Taking action is better than waiting for perfection.

elements.name: Kakeibo
elements.description: Make a budget and track youir expenses and cultivate mindful spending habits. Set financial goals and work towards it. Necessity is the mother of all invention.
